com.adidas.ui.widget

Class AdidasTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextView
      • com.adidas.ui.widget.AdidasTextView

  • public class AdidasTextView
extends android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextView
    Extension of android.widget.TextView to support custom text font and underlying in case when content of this component is a link.
